src: “हामीसँग अहिले पहिला मधुमेह भएका र हाल नभएका 4 महिनाका मुसा छन्”, भनेर उनले थपे।
mt: “We have four 4-month-old monkeys with diabetes and four without,” she added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: हेलिफ्याक्स, नोभा स्कोटिया स्थित डलहाउजी युनिभर्सिटीका औषधि-उपचार प्राध्यापक र क्यानाडियन डायबिटीज (मधुमेह) एसोसिएशनको क्लिनिकल र वैज्ञानिक डिभिजनका अध्यक्ष डा. एहूद उरले अनुसन्धान अझै सुरुको दिनमा नै रहेको चेतावनी दिए।
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a pharmacotherapy professor at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and president of the Canadian Diabetes Association's clinical and scientific division, warned that research is still in its infancy.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: यी खोजहरू पहिले नै टाइप 1 मधुमेह भएका व्यक्तिहरूसँग सान्दर्भिक छैनन् भन्ने कुरा ध्यानमा राख्दै केही अन्य विज्ञहरू जस्तै उनी पनि मधुमेह निको हुन सक्छ कि भनेर शंकास्पद छन्।
mt: These searches are not relevant to people who already have type 1 diabetes, according to some other scientists, including him, who are skeptical that diabetes can be cured.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: सोमबारका दिन सारा ड्यानियस, स्विडिस एकेडेमीमा नोबेल साहित्य समितिका स्थायी सचिवले, स्विडेनको सेभेरिजेस रेडियोको एक रेडियो कार्यक्रममा सार्वजनिक रूपमा घोषणा गरे कि बब डिलनलाई साहित्यमा 2016 को नोबेल पुरस्कार पाउने बारेमा सिधै पुग्न असमर्थ भएकाले समितिले उहाँसम्म पुग्न आफ्ना प्रयासहरू त्यागिदियो।
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, the Swedish Academy's permanent secretary, announced publicly on a radio program of the Swedish public radio that Bob Dylan had been awarded the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, but that she had been unable to reach him directly, so the committee had abandoned its efforts.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: अहिले हामी केही गरिरहेका छैनौं। मैले उसको नजिकैको सहयोगीलाई फोन र इमेल पठाएर धेरै मैत्रीपूर्ण जवाफ पाएको छु। अहिलेका लागि यो पर्याप्त छ डानियसले भने।
mt: We are not doing anything at the moment. I have called and emailed a colleague nearby and have received very friendly responses. For now, this is sufficient, Danes said.
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: यसअघि, रिङ्गका सिइओ, जेमी सिमिनअफले आफ्नो पसलको ढोकाको घण्टी आफ्नो ग्यारेजमा श्रवणयोग्य नभएको बेलादेखि कम्पनी सुरु गरेको टिप्पणी गर्नुभयो।
mt: Previously, the CEO of the ring, Jamie Siminoff, had commented that he had started the company when the doorbell of his store was not audible in his garage.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: उनले Wifi ढोकाको घण्टी बनाएको भने।
mt: He made a WiFi doorbell.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: सिमिनोफले भन्नुभयो कि सन् 2013 मा सार्क ट्याङ्क एपिसोडमा उहाँको उपस्थितिपछि बिक्री बढेको छ जहाँ शो प्यानलले स्टार्टअपलाई वित्तीय पोषण दिन अस्वीकार गरेको थियो।
mt: 2013's Sarc Tank episode, where the panel rejected startups for financial support, has seen an increase in sales since his appearance.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: गत सन् 2017 सालमा, सिमिनअफ किनमेल गरिने टेलिभिजन च्यानल QVC मा देखिनुभयो।
mt: 2017, it was seen on the television channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: रिङले प्रतिस्पर्धा गर्ने सुरक्षा कम्पनी ADT कर्पोरेसनसँग पनि मुद्दा मिलायो।
mt: The ring also filed a complaint with security company ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: जब एक प्रयोगात्मक खोप इबोलाको मृत्युदर घटाउनका लागि सक्षम देखिन्छ, अहिलेसम्म कुनै पनि औषधि विद्यमान संक्रमणको उपचारका लागि स्पष्ट रूपमा उपयुक्त देखिएको छैन।
mt: When a trial vaccine appears to reduce mortality from Ebola, no existing drug has yet been clearly effective in treating the existing infection.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: एउटा एन्टिबडी ककटेल, जेडम्यापले, सुरुमा यस क्षेत्रमा प्रतिज्ञा देखाएको छ, तर औपचारिक अध्ययनले यसको मृत्युको रोकथाममा खोजेभन्दा कम लाभ भएको सङ्केत गरेको छ।
mt: One antiviral cocktail, Zidovudine, was first used in this area, but formal studies have shown it to have little benefit in preventing death.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: PALM परीक्षणमा, ZMappले नियन्त्रणका रूपमा काम गर्नु भनेको मतलब वैज्ञानिकले यसलाई आधारभूत रूपमा प्रयोग गरेर तीन अन्य उपचारहरूसँग तुलना गरे।
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp's success in controlling the disease means scientists can use it as a baseline to compare it with three other treatments.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: USA जिम्नास्टिक संयुक्त राज्य ओलम्पिक समितिको पत्रको समर्थन गर्दछ र हाम्रा सबै खेलाडीहरूका लागि सुरक्षित वातावरण प्रबर्द्धन गर्न ओलम्पिक परिवारको परम आवश्यकतालाई स्वीकार गर्दछ।
mt: The USA Gymnastics Board of Directors supports the U.S. Olympic Committee's statement and recognizes the need for a safe environment for all our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: हामी USOC को कथनसँग सहमत छौं कि विघटन भन्दा बरू हाम्रा एथ्लिट र क्लबहरूको हित र तिनीहरूको खेल सायद हाम्रो सङ्घ भित्र अर्थपूर्ण परिवर्तनको साथ अघि बढेर अझ राम्रो सेवा दिन सकिन्छ।
mt: We agree with USOC's statement that dissolution is preferable to bankruptcy for our athletes and clubs, and that a more efficient and effective service can be provided with a restructuring of our federation.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: USA जिमनास्टिक्सले स्वतन्त्र अनुसन्धानलाई समर्थन गर्दछ, जुन लेरी नासारका बचेका मानिसहरूले यति साहसपूर्वक ढंगले वर्णन गरिएको मात्राको दुरुपयोगलाई कसरी यति लामो समयसम्म पत्ता लगाउन नसकेको भन्ने कुरामा प्रकाश पार्न सक्दछ र कुनै आवश्यक र उपयुक्त परिवर्तनलाई अँगाल्दछ।
mt: USA Gymnastics supports independent research that can shed light on how such abuse was allowed to go on for so long and what necessary and appropriate changes can be made.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: USA जिम्नास्टिक र USOC को एउटै लक्ष्य छ: खेलाडीहरू सुरक्षित, सकारात्मक र सशक्त वातावरणमा खेलेर आफ्नो सपना साकार गर्ने दिशातर्फ अघि बढ्न सकून् भनेर जिम्नास्टिक र अन्य खेलहरू सक्दो सुरक्षित बनाउने।
mt: The USA Gymnastics and USOC have the same goal: to ensure that athletes can compete in a safe, positive, and empowering environment to achieve their dreams.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: 1960 को दशकमा, ब्रजेजिनस्कीले John F. Kennedy का लागि सल्लाहकारको र त्यसपछि Lyndon B. Johnson प्रशासनको रूपमा काम गरे।
mt: 1960s, Brzezinski served as an advisor to John F. Kennedy and then as a member of the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: 1976 को चयनको अवधिमा उनले कार्टरलाई विदेशी नीतिमा सुझाव दिए, त्यसपछि हेनरी किसिङ्गरपछि 1977 देखि 1981 सम्म राष्ट्रिय सुरक्षा सल्लाहकार (NSA) को रूपमा सेवा गरे।
mt: 1976 in his tenure he advised Carter on foreign policy, then Henry Kissinger from 1977 to 1981 as National Security Advisor (NSA).
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: NSA को रूपमा उनले Carter लाई कूटनीतिक रूपमा संसारको मामिला सम्हाल्न सहयोग गरे जस्तै क्याम्प डेभिड सामञ्जस्यता, 1978; 1970 को दशकको पछिल्लो समयमा युएस – चीन सम्बन्धकोलाई सामान्य बनाउने सोच; इरानी क्रान्ति, जसले इरान बन्धकको सङ्कट सिर्जना गर्‍यो, 1979; र अफगानिस्तानमा सोभियत आक्रमण, 1979।
mt: As NSA, he advised Carter on foreign affairs, such as Camp David accords, 1978; normalizing US-China relations in the later 1970s; Iranian revolution, which created the hostage crisis, 1979; and Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: रायन गोस्लिङ र एम्मा स्टोन प्रस्तुत गर्ने चलचित्रले सबै मुख्य वर्गहरूमा नामाङ्कन प्राप्त गर्‍यो।
mt: Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone star in the film, which received nominations in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: गोसलिङ र स्टोनले क्रमशः सर्वश्रेष्ठ अभिनेता र अभिनेत्रीका लागि नामाङ्कन प्राप्त गरे।
mt: Gosling and Stone were both nominated for Best Actor and Actress respectively.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: अन्य मनोनयनहरूमा सर्वश्रेष्ठ तस्विर, निर्देशक, छायाङ्कन, पोशाक डिजाइन, फिल्म सम्पादन, मौलिक स्कोर, उत्पादन डिजाइन, ध्वनि सम्पादन, ध्वनि मिश्रण र मूल स्क्रिनप्ले समावेश भएका छन्।
mt: Other nominations include best picture, director, cinematography, costume design, film editing, original score, production design, sound editing, sound mixing and original screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: अडिशन चलचित्रका दुई गीतहरू, (द फूल्स हू ड्रीम) र सिटी अफ स्टार्सले सर्वोत्कृष्ट मौलिक गीतका लागि नामाङ्‍कन प्राप्त गरे। लायन्सगेट स्टुडियोले कुनै पनि अन्य स्टुडियोभन्दा बढी 26 नामाङ्कनहरू प्राप्त गर्‍यो।
mt: 2 songs from the soundtrack, "(The Flowers of) Dreams" and "City of Stars", were nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate Studios received more nominations than any other studio, with 26.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: आइतबारको अन्ततिर, संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकाका राष्ट्रपति डोनाल्ड ट्रम्पले, प्रेस सचिवमार्फत दिएका विज्ञप्‍तिमा अमेरिकी सेनाले सिरिया छोडेर जाने घोषणा गरे।
mt: On Friday, President Donald Trump of the United States, through a press release by his press secretary, announced that the United States military would leave Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Trump ले टर्कीका राष्ट्रपति Recep Tayyip Erdoğan सँग फोनमा कुराकानी गरिसकेपछि यो घोषणा गरिएको थियो।
mt: This was announced after Trump spoke by phone with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: टर्कीले पक्राउ गरिएका ISIS लडाकूहरूको सुरक्षा गर्ने काम पनि गर्नेछ, जुन विज्ञप्‍तिले भनेको छ, युरोपियन देशहरूले स्वदेश फिर्ता गर्न अस्वीकार गरेका छन्।
mt: Turkey will also take care of captured ISIS fighters, which reports say, European countries have refused to repatriate.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: यसले पहिला नै फैलिएको सिद्धान्त, कम्तीमा केही डायनासोरहरूका प्वाँखहरू थिए भन्ने कुरालाई मात्र पुष्टि गर्दैन, बरु जीवाश्महरूले सामान्यतया सक्दैनन् भन्ने सक्दैन भन्ने विवरणहरू प्रदान गर्दछ जस्तो कि रङ्ग र त्रि-आयामिक व्यवस्था।
mt: This does not confirm the previously established theory that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, but rather provides details such as color and three-dimensional arrangement that had not been known.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: वैज्ञानिकहरूले भनेका छन् कि यस जनावरको प्वाँख माथितिर फुस्रो खैरो र तलतिर फिक्का पहेंलो वा क्यारोटेनोइड रङ्गको थियो।
mt: The scientists said the animal's feathers were brownish gray on top and reddish or carotenoid-colored on the bottom.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: चराहरूमा प्वाँखको विकासको अन्तरदृष्टि पनि यस खोजले प्रदान गर्छ।
mt: The study also provides insight into the development of feathers in birds.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: डाइनोसरको पँखेटामा राचिस भनिने साफ्ट राम्रोसँग विकसित नभए पनि बार्ब्स र बार्बुल्स नामक पँखेटाका अन्य गुणहरू हुने भएकाले खोजकर्ताहरूले राचिस सम्भवतः यी दुई गुणहरूभन्दा पछि विकसित भएको हुनु पर्छ भन्ने कुराको निष्कर्ष निकालेका छन्।
mt: The researchers found that the softness of the dinosaur's feathers was not fully developed, but other features of the feathers, such as barbs and barbules, were present, leading them to conclude that rachis may have been developed after these two features.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: प्वाँखहरूको संरचनाले सुझाव दिन्छ कि ती उडानमा प्रयोग भएका थिएनन् बरु तापमान नियमन वा प्रदर्शनका लागि प्रयोग गरिएका थिए। अनुसन्धानकर्ताहरूले सुझाव दिए कि, यो एक युवा डायनासोरको पुच्छर भए तापनि, नमूनाले कुखुराको प्वाँख होइन, वयस्क प्वाँख देखाउँछ।
mt: The structure of the feathers suggests that they were not used for flight, but rather for temperature regulation or display. Researchers suggest that this is a juvenile dinosaur's tail, not a chicken feather, but the specimen shows adult feathers.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: यो युवा डायनासोरको पुच्छर भए तापनि, नमूनाले वयस्क प्वाँख देखाउँदछ, बच्चाोक प्वाँख होइन भन्ने अनुसन्धानकर्ताहरूले सुझाव दिए।
mt: This young dinosaur's tail, but the specimen shows adult feathers, not juvenile ones, researchers suggest.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: टर्कीको गाजियनटेपमा हिजो बिहान पुलिस मुख्यालयमा भएको एक कार बम बिस्फोटमा परि दुई पुलिस अधिकारीको मृत्यु भयो र बिसभन्दा बढी अरू मानिसहरू घाइते भए।
mt: 2 police officers were killed and more injured in a car bomb explosion at a police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, this morning.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: गभर्नरको कार्यालयले भन्यो कि घाइतेहरूमध्ये उन्नाइस जना पुलिस अधिकारीहरू थिए।
mt: 15 police officers were among the injured, according to the governor's office.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: प्रहरीले भन्यो कि तिनीहरूले यो आक्रमणका लागि तथाकथित डाएस (ISIL) लडाकुलाई शङ्का गर्छन्।
mt: Police say they suspect the attack was carried out by the so-called Islamic State (ISIL) militants.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: उनीहरूले अन्य ताराहरूको जस्तै आधारभूत सिद्धान्तहरूमा सूर्य संचालित भएको फेला पारे। प्रणालीमा सबै ताराहरूको क्रियाकलाप उनीहरूको उज्यालोपन, परिक्रमणले चालित भएको पाए, अन्य केहीले होइन।
mt: They found that the system is driven by the Sun, as are all the other stars, in their basic principles. The system's behavior is driven by its luminosity, its rotation, as is not the case with others.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: प्लाज्मा प्रवाहसँग सम्बन्धित भएको प्रकाश र रोटेशन एक साथ ताराको संख्या निर्धारण गर्न पनि प्रयोग गरिन्छ।
mt: The plasma flow is related to the light and rotation of the number of stars together.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: रस्बी सङ्ख्या जति सानो हुन्छ, चुम्बकीय उत्क्रमणको सम्बन्धमा उति कम सक्रिय तारा।
mt: The smaller the Rubik's cube, the less active the magnetic interference.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: आफ्नो यात्राको क्रममा इवासाकी(Iwasaki) ले धेरै पटक समस्यामा परे।
mt: Iwasaki had many problems on his journey.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: उनलाई समुद्री डाँकुहरूले लुटेका थिए र उनलाई तिब्बतमा एक कुख्यात कुकुरले हमला गरेको थियो, उनले नेपालमा विवाह गरेका थिए भने उनलाई भारतमा पक्राउ गरिएको थियो।
mt: He was kidnapped by pirates and attacked by a notorious yak in Tibet, he married in Nepal and was arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: 802.11n मानक 2.4Ghz र 5.0Ghz दुवै फ्रिक्वेन्सीमा कार्य गर्दछ।
mt: 802.11n standard works on both 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: यसले 802.11a, 802.11b र 802.11g सँग पछाडिपट्टि संगत हुन यसलाई अनुमति दिन्छ, आधार स्टेसन सँग दोहोरो रेडियो छ भने।
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g are backward compatible, allowing the device to connect to dual radio base stations.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: 802.11n को गति यसको पूर्ववर्तीहरूको भन्दा 600Mbit/s को अधिकतम सैद्धान्तिक प्रवाहसहित अधिक द्रुत छ।
mt: 802.11n has a maximum theoretical throughput of 600 Mbit/s, more than its predecessors.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: विवाह गरेर दुई वयस्क बच्चाहरू भएका डुभलले मिलरमा ठूलो छाप छोडेनन्, जससँग कथा सम्बन्धित थियो।
mt: Dubhal, who was married and had two adult children, left a large impression in Miller, where he was known for his stories.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: टिप्पणीका लागि आग्रह गर्दा, मिलरले भने, "सुनुवाईको समयमा माइक धेरै बोल्छन्... म तयार भइरहेको थिएँ त्यसैले म उनले के भनिरहेका थिए भनेर साँच्चै नै सुनिरहेको थिइन।"
mt: "I was ready to go, so I was really listening to what he was saying," Miller said in a statement. "He was talking a lot during the walk-through... I was ready to go, so I was really listening to what he was saying," Miller said in a statement. "He was talking a lot during the walk-through... I was ready to go, so I was really listening to what he was saying," Miller said in a statement. "He was talking a lot during the walk-through... I was ready to go, so I was really listening to what he was saying," Miller said in a statement. "He was talking a lot during the walk-through... I was ready to go, so I was really listening to what he was saying," Miller said in a statement. "He was talking a lot during the walk-through... I was ready to go, so I was really listening to what he was saying," Miller said in a statement. "He was talking a lot during the walk-through... I was ready to go, so I was really listening to what he was saying," Miller said in a statement. "He was talking a lot during the walk-through... I was ready to go, so I was really listening to what he was saying," Miller said in a statement. "He was talking a lot during the walk-through... I was ready to go, so I was really listening to what he was saying," Miller said in a statement. "He was talking a lot during the walk-through... I was ready to go, so I was really listening to what he was saying," Miller said in a statement. "He was talking a lot during the walk-through... I was ready to go, so I was really listening to what he was saying," Miller said in a statement. "He was talking a lot during the walk-through... I was ready to go, so I was really listening to what he was saying," Miller said in a statement. "He was talking a lot during the walk-through... I was ready to go, so I was really listening to what he was saying," Miller said in a statement. "He was talking a lot during the walk-through... I was ready to go, so I was really listening to what he was saying," Miller said in a statement. "He was talking a lot during the walk-through... I was ready to go, so I was really listening to what he was saying," Miller said in a statement. "He was talking a lot during the walk-through... I
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: “हामी 2005 को स्तरबाट 2020 सम्ममा GDP को प्रति एकाइ कार्बन डाईअक्साइड उत्सर्जनलाई उल्लेखनीय मार्जिनबाट कटौती गर्ने प्रयास गर्नेछौं”, भनी हूले भने।
mt: “We will make a significant reduction in per capita carbon dioxide emissions from the 2005 level by 2020,” Hul said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: तिनीहरू चीनको आर्थिक उत्पादनमा आधारित रहेर बनाइने छन् भन्दै उनले कटौतीका लागि आँकडा निर्धारण गरेका छैनन्।
mt: He has not yet determined the numbers for cuts based on China's economic output.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: विकासोन्मुख देशहरूलाई हूले “पहिले प्रदूषण गर्ने र पछि सफा गर्ने मार्गबाट जोगिन प्रोत्साहित गरे।”
mt: “Developing countries are encouraged to follow the ‘pollute first, clean up later’ path,” Hul said.
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: उहाँले “उनीहरूलाई आफ्नो विकास चरण, जिम्मेवारी र क्षमताभन्दा पर जाने दायित्वहरू लिन आग्रह गरे पनि उनीहरूले गर्नुहुँदैन” भनेर थप्नुभयो।
mt: He added, "They should take responsibility for their development, accountability and capabilities, but they can't do it."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: इराक स्टडी ग्रुपले आज 12.00 GMT मा आफ्नो रिपोर्ट प्रस्तुत गर्‍यो।
mt: The Iraq Study Group released its report today at 12:00 GMT.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: यसले कसैले पनि ईराकमा यस बिन्दुमा कुनै पनि कार्यवाहीले साम्प्रदायिक युद्ध, बढ्दो हिंसा वा अराजकतातिरको स्लाईड रोक्नेछ भनेर ग्यारेण्टी दिन सक्दैन भन्दै चेतावनी दिन्छ।
mt: It warns that no one can guarantee that any action will prevent sectarian war, increased violence or anarchy in Iraq.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: यो प्रतिवेदन मध्य पूर्वको नीतिका बारेमा संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकामा खुल्ला बहस र सहमति गठन गर्नका लागि अनुरोध गर्न खुल्यो।
mt: This report was opened to request open debate and consensus on U.S. policy in the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: यो प्रतिवेदनमा कार्यकारीले इराकप्रति लिएको वर्तमान नीतिको लगभग सबै पक्षको आलोचना गरिएको छ तुरुन्तै उक्त नीति परिवर्तन गर्न आग्रह गरिएको छ।
mt: This report criticizes almost all aspects of the current policy towards Iraq, and calls for immediate policy changes.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: यसका 78 सिफारिसहरूमध्ये पहिलो यो हो कि प्रतिरोधी हस्तक्षेपहरूको विरूद्ध इराकको सीमाना सुरक्षित गर्न र यसका छिमेकीहरूसँग कुटनीतिक सम्बन्धहरू पुनर्स्थापना गर्न यो वर्षको समाप्तिअघि नयाँ कुटनीतिक पहलहरू गर्नुपर्छ।
mt: 78 of these requests are the first to secure Iraq's border against resistance interference and to reestablish diplomatic relations with its neighbors before the end of the year.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: वर्तमान सिनेटर तथा अर्जेन्टिनाकी प्रथम महिला क्रिस्टिना फर्नान्डेज डी किर्चनार (Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner) ले बुनेस आयर्सबाट 50 किलोमिटर (31 माइल) टाढा रहेको सहर ला प्लाटामा हिजो साँझ आफूलाई राष्ट्रपति पदको उम्मेद्वार घोषणा गरेकी छिन्।
mt: Current Senator and first lady of Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced this evening in La Plata, 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires, that she will run for president.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: श्रीमती किर्चनरले अर्जेन्टाइन थिएटरमा राष्ट्रपतिका लागि लड्ने आफ्नो योजनाको घोषणा त्यही ठाउँमा गरिन् जुन उनले ब्युनर्स आयर्स प्रान्त प्रतिनिधिमण्डलको सदस्यका रूपमा सिनेटका लागि 2005 को अभियान सुरु गर्न प्रयोग गरेकी थिइन्।
mt: Mrs. Kirchner announced her candidacy for president in the same place where she had begun her campaign for a seat in the Senate in 2005 as a member of the Buenos Aires Province Delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: आँधिबेहरी क्याट्रिनाका सम्बन्धमा राहत तथा पुनर्निर्माणमा खर्च गर्ने विषयमा विवाद चर्किएको थियो जसलाई केही वित्तीय कट्टरपन्थीहरूले “बुसको नयाँ ओर्लिन्स डिल” को हास्यपूर्वक लेबल लगाएका छन्।
mt: Controversy arose over spending on relief and reconstruction related to Hurricane Katrina, which some financial conservatives have dubbed "The New Orleans Bus Stop" in a humorous label.
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: पुनः र्निर्माण प्रयासको लिबरल आलोचना कथित वासिङ्टन भित्रकालाई पुनः र्निर्माण ठेक्का प्रदान गरेकोमा केन्द्रित रहेको छ।
mt: The project has been criticized for its liberal reconstruction, with the focus on rebuilding the center of Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: चार मिलियनभन्दा बढी मानिसहरू अन्त्येष्टिमा भाग लिन रोम गए।
mt: 4 million people took part in the funeral in Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: उपस्थित मान्छेहरूको सङ्ख्या ठूलो भएर सबैलाई सेन्ट पिटर्स स्क्वायरमा अन्त्येष्टिमा जान सम्भव थिएन।
mt: The large number of people present made it impossible for all to attend the funeral at St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: रोमका विभिन्न ठाउँहरूमा मान्छेहरूलाई समारोह हेर्न दिनका लागि धेरै ठूला टेलिभिजन स्क्रिनहरू जडान गरिएका थिए।
mt: In various parts of Rome, large television screens were installed for people to watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: इटालीका अन्य धेरै सहरहरू र विश्वको बाँकी स्थानहरूमा, र विशेष गरी पोल्यान्डमा यस्तै सेटअपहरू बनाइएका थिए, जुन धेरै मान्छेहरूद्वारा हेरिएको थियो।
mt: Similar setups were in place in many other Italian cities and around the world, especially in Poland, where many people were watching.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: एजेन्सीको सफलता दरलाई बढावा दिने अभिप्रायले समाधान गर्न सजिलो मामिलामा विशेष गरी चोरी भएका कार मुद्दाहरूमा स्रोतहरू केन्द्रित रहेकाले इतिहासकारहरूले विगतका FBI नीतिहरूको आलोचना गरे।
mt: The criticism of past FBI policies by historians who focused on easy cases such as stolen car matters with sources centered on the intention to increase the success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: काङ्ग्रेसले वित्तीय 2005 मा अश्लीलता पहललाई वित्तीय पोषण गर्न सुरू गर्यो र FBIलाई 10 एजेन्ट वयस्क अश्लीलताका लागि छुट्याउनु पर्छ भनेर निर्दिष्ट गर्यो।
mt: 2005, the Congress began funding the first financial obscenity initiative, and directed the FBI to assign 10 agents to combat adult obscenity.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: रोबिन उथाप्पाले 11 चौका र 2 छक्का हानेर मात्र 41 बलमा 70 रन बनाउँदै इनिङको उच्चतम अङ्क बनाए।
mt: 11 catches and 2 stumpings by Robin Uthappa, who scored 70 runs off 41 balls, the highest score of the innings.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: मध्यक्रमका ब्याट्सम्यान सचिन टेन्डुलकर (Sachin Tendulkar) र राहुल द्राविड (Rahul Dravid)ले राम्रो प्रदर्शन गरेर सय रनको साझेदारी गरे।
mt: Middle-order batsmen Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid both put on good performances to share a 200-run partnership.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: तर कप्तानको विकेट गुमाएपछि भारतले 7 विकेट गुमाएर 36 रन मात्रै बनायो।
mt: 7 wickets down for 36 runs after captain's wicket was lost.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: अमेरिकी राष्ट्रपति जर्ज डब्ल्यु. बुस एक साता लामो एसियाको यात्रा सुरुवात गर्दै नोभेम्बर 16 को बिहान सिङ्गापुर आइपुगे।
mt: 16 November 2000: U.S. President George W. Bush began a seven-day Asian tour by arriving in Singapore in the morning.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: उनलाई सिङ्गापुरका उपप्रधानमन्त्री Wong Kan Sengले स्वागत गरे र सिङ्गापुरका प्रधानमन्त्री लि सियेन लुङ (Lee Hsien Loong) सँग व्यापार र आतङ्कआतङ्कवादसम्बन्धी मुद्दाहरूको बारेमा छलफल गरे।
mt: He was welcomed by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and held talks with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong on trade and counter-terrorism issues.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: मध्यावधि चुनावमा हारेको एक सातापछि बुसले एक दर्शकलाई एसियाको व्यापारका विस्तारको बारेमा बताए।
mt: 7 days after losing the mid-term election, Bush spoke to a crowd about the expansion of Asia's economy.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: प्रधानमन्त्री स्टेफेन हार्परले PMO मा NDP का नेता ज्याक लेटनसँग मङ्गलबार 25 मिनेटको बैठक बसेपछि सरकारको “स्वच्छ हावासम्बन्धी ऐन'को दोस्रो सुनुवाइअघि उक्त ऐन समीक्षाका निम्ति सर्वदलीय समितिमा पठाउन सहमति जनाएका छन्।
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper met with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO for 25 minutes on Monday before the second reading of the government's "Clean Air Act" to send the bill to a multi-party committee for review.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: लेटोन (Layton) ले कन्जर्वेटिभ पार्टीको वातावरणीय विधेयकको "विस्तृत र पूर्ण पुनर्लेखन" का लागि आग्रह गर्दै प्रधानमन्त्रीसँगको भेटमा कन्जर्भेटिभको वातावरणीय विधेयकमा परिवर्तन गर्न आग्रह गरेका थिए।
mt: Layton urged Prime Minister Stephen Harper to "comprehensively rewrite" the Conservative Party's environmental bill, which he said was "fundamentally flawed".
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: सङ्घीय सरकारले तास्मेनियाको डेभनपोर्टमा रहेको मर्सी अस्पतालको कोष लिन कदम चालेको छ। राज्य सरकार र केही सङ्घीय सांसदहरूले नोभेम्बरसम्म बोलाउनु पर्ने सङ्घीय चुनावको प्रस्तावनाको यो कार्यलाई आलोचनाको रूपमा लिए।
mt: The federal government has taken steps to seize the Mercy Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania. The state government and some federal MPs have criticised the work of the federal election proposal, which is to be held by November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: प्रधानमन्त्रीले तर जोन हवार्डले अतिरिक्त AUD$45 मिलियन डलर दिएको बेलामा यस ऐनलाई उक्त अस्पतालका सुविधाहरूलाई तास्मानीयाको सरकारले तल्लो दर्जामा झर्नबाट जोगाउन मात्रै ल्याइएको थियो भने।
mt: Prime Minister Tony Abbott said the announcement was only to keep the hospital's facilities from falling into disrepair, not to fund the project, which was already under way when the government offered an additional AUD$45 million.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: पछिल्लो बुलेटिनका अनुसार, समुद्री सतह नाप्ने यन्त्रले सुनामी उत्पन्न भएको सङ्केत गर्यो। पागो पागो र निउ नजिकै केहि निश्चित सुनामी गतिविधि रेकर्ड गरिएको थियो।
mt: Last bulletins reported that a sea level sensor indicated a tsunami was generated. Some minor tsunami activity was recorded near Pago Pago and Niu.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: टोङ्गामा कुनै ठूलो क्षति वा घाइतेको रिपोर्ट गरिएको छैन, तर बिजुली अस्थायी रूपमा बन्द भयो, जसले कथित रूपमा टोङ्गनका अधिकारीहरूलाई PTWC ले जारी गरेको सुनामी चेतावनी प्राप्त गर्नबाट रोक्यो।
mt: There are no reports of major damage or injuries in Tonga, but power was temporarily cut, which allegedly prevented Tongan officials from receiving a tsunami warning issued by PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: चेतावनी हटाइएको भएता पनि हवाईको तटवर्ती इलाकामा वा नजिकैका स्थानमा रहेका चौधवटा विद्यालयहरू बुधवार बन्द गरिए।
mt: Schools in the area or nearby were closed on Wednesday despite the warning being lifted.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: संयुक्त राज्यका राष्ट्रपति जर्ज डब्ल्यु बुस (George W. Bush) ले यस घोषणालाई स्वागत गर्नुभयो।
mt: United States President George W. Bush welcomed this announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: बुशका प्रवक्ता गोर्डन जोनड्रोले उत्तर कोरियाको यो प्रतिबद्धतालाई “कोरियाली प्रायद्वीपमा प्रमाणित परमाणु निशस्त्रीकरण प्राप्त गर्ने लक्ष्यको दिशामा एउटा महत्त्वपूर्ण कदम भने।”
mt: Bush's spokesman Gordon Johndroe said this commitment "is an important step toward the goal of verified denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: एट्लान्टिक तूफान मौसमको दसौँ नामको तूफान, उप उष्ण प्रदेशिय तुफान जेरी, आज एट्लान्टिक महासागरमा गठन भयो।
mt: 10th named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season, Tropical Storm Jerry, formed today in the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: राष्ट्रिय हरिकेन केन्द्र (NHC) ले भन्छ कि यस बिन्दुमा जेरीले जमिनमा कुनै खतरा गर्दैन।
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says this area poses no threat to land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: यु.एस. कोर्प्स अफ इन्जिनियरहरूको अनुमान छ कि 6 इन्च वर्षाले विगतमा क्षतिग्रस्त बाँधलाई तोड्नेछ।
mt: 6 inch rainfall is expected to have washed out the damaged levee.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: नवौं वार्ड, जहाँ तुफान क्याट्रिनाका बेला 20 फिट सम्म उचाई भएको बाढी आएको थियो, अहिले नजिकैको बाँधलाई पार गरेकाले कम्मरसम्मको पानीमा छ।
mt: 20 feet of floodwaters had covered the 10th ward during Hurricane Katrina, but now the levee has been breached and the water is up to the knees.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: पानी 100 फिट चौडाइमा सेतुमाथि बगिरहेको छ।
mt: 100 feet of water is above the runway.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: विगतमा विकीन्युजसँग कुरा गर्दा कमन्सका प्रशासक एडम कुएर्डनले मेटिएको प्रति निराशा व्यक्त गरे।
mt: In a previous interview with Wikinews, Commons' administrator Adam Kueper expressed disappointment at the loss.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: “उस (वेल्स)ले मूलरूपमा हामीलाई सुरुदेखि झूटा बोल्यो। पहिले, यो कानुनी कारणका लागि हो भनेर अभिनय गर्यो। दोस्रो, आफ्नो कला मेटाउने कार्यसम्म,उ हाम्रो कुरा सुन्दै छ भनेर बहाना गर्यो।”
mt: “He (Wales) has been lying to us from the start. First, he was acting as if it was for legal reasons. Second, he was making excuses that he was listening to our concerns to the extent of his work.”
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: समुदायको जलनले साइटका लागि यौन सामग्रीका बारेमा नीति निर्माण गर्न हालका प्रयासहरू निम्त्यायो जसले लाखौं खुला-इजाजत प्राप्त मिडिया होस्ट गर्दछ।
mt: The community's fire has prompted efforts to create a policy for the site regarding sexual content, which hosts millions of open-access media.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: गरेको काम अधिकांश रूपमा सैद्धान्तिक थियो, तर यो कार्यक्रम धनु आकाशगंगाको गरिएको अवलोकनलाई अनुकरण गर्नका लागि लेखिएको थियो।
mt: The work was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to mimic observations of the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: आकाशगंगाको डार्क म्याटर र मिल्की वेको डार्क म्याटरका बीचमा ज्वलन्त शक्तिले निम्त्याएको प्रभाव टोलीले खोजिरहेको थियो।
mt: The effect of the burning power between the dark matter of the Milky Way and the dark matter of the Milky Way was being searched for by the team.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: जसरी चन्द्रमाले पृथ्वीलाई आफूतिर तान्छ र समुद्रमा ज्वारभाटा उत्पन्न गर्छ, त्यस्तै गरी आकाशगङ्गाले स्यागिटेरस तारापुञ्जमा बल लगाउँछ।
mt: As the Moon pulls the Earth into its orbit and creates tides in the oceans, so the Sagittarius star cluster pulls the Sagittarius star cluster into its orbit.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: वैज्ञानिकहरू यो निष्कर्षमा पुग्न सक्षम भए कि अँध्यारो पदार्थले अन्य अँध्यारो पदार्थलाई नियमित पदार्थले पार्ने जस्तै तरिकामा प्रभाव पार्दछ।
mt: The scientists concluded that dark matter halos can affect each other in the same way that normal matter halos affect each other.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: यस सिद्धान्तअनुसार, आकाशगङ्गाको वरिपरिको अँध्यारो पदार्थ एक प्रकारको घेरामा अवस्थित छ जुन धेरै साना कणहरूबाट बनेको छ।
mt: This theory posits that the dark matter surrounding the galaxy is in the form of a ring, made up of many small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: टेलिभिजन रिपोर्टहरूले प्लान्टबाट सेतो धुवाँ आउँदै गरेको देखाउँछन्।
mt: Television reports show smoke coming from the plant.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: बिरूवा वरपरका बासिन्दाहरूलाई घरभित्र रहन, वातानुकूलन बन्द गर्न र नलका पानी नपिउन स्थानीय अधिकारीहरूले चेतावनी दिइरहेका छन्।
mt: Local officials have warned residents near the river to stay indoors, turn off air conditioning and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: जापानको आणविक एजेन्सीकाअनुसार विरुवामा रेडियोधर्मी सिजियम र आयोडिन फेला परेको छ।
mt: The Japanese Atomic Energy Agency says it has found radioactive cesium and iodine in the sprouts.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: अधिकारीहरू अनुमान लगाउँछन् कि यसले क्षेत्रमा यूरेनियम ईन्धन बोकेका कन्टेनरहरू फुटेका  हुन सक्छन् र चुहिरहेका छन् भन्ने सङ्केत गर्दछ।
mt: Officials estimate that it may have broken open containers of uranium fuel in the area and leaked.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr. Tony Moll ले दक्षिण अफ्रिकी क्षेत्र क्वाजुलु-नतालमा अत्यधिक औषधि प्रतिरोधक क्षयरोग (XDR-TB) पत्ता लगाए।
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered extremely drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region of KwaZulu-Natal.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: एक अन्तर्वार्तामा, उहाँले नयाँ सँस्करण “धेरै उच्च मृत्यु दरका कारण धेरै उच्च चिन्ताजनक र डरलाग्दो थियो” भनेर भन्नुभयो।
mt: In an interview, he said the new version was "very high mortality rate, very high concern and scary."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: केही बिरामीहरूले अस्पतालमा कीरा ग्रहण गरेका हुन सक्दछन् भन्ने डा. मोल सोच्दछन् र कम्तीमा दुईजना अस्पतालका स्वास्थ्यकर्मी थिए।
mt: Dr. Mool speculates that some patients may have contracted the mites at the hospital and at least two hospital staff were infected.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
